reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with one noting the sequins are stitched on well. The dress is flattering with a slimming design, comfortable, and customers consider it good value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's perfect, others find it too long for short people. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs a little big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: Absolutely stunning dress! It’s beautifully made, has a nice weight to it, and the beading is gorgeous. I’m 5’4”, 138 lbs, and a 32G, and the fit was incredibly flattering. I wore it to a Roaring 20’s party and got so many compliments. The quality is so good you could easily wear it to a gala or any elegant evening event. Read more
items.author: Siún

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous 1920’s flapper/art deco gown.
items.body: This dress is stunning. The beading was on securely. The back zipper worked well, the length was perfect for my height of 5’8”. The model in the photo is probably about 5’7”, as it was about an inch shorter on me. The black slip went a bit above my ankles, but the beaded layer went to my feet but did not touch the floor. A shorter person could easily trim off a few inches of the beaded layer as the beading is sparse near the hem. The size chart was accurate for me- I ordered a Small (what it said would fit me) and it fit perfectly. For reference, I’m 5’8 and around 116 lbs It had a bit of stretch/give in the fit but I would not say it was stretchy. It is also not too heavyweight compared with other beaded dresses I own. I did not want the fringe on the sleeves, and was able to carefully cut it off with no damage to the rest of the sleeve. You could also easily cut off the entire sleeve if you wanted a sleeveless look- just ask someone who is used to working with tulle if you don’t know how to do that. This dress offers so many options for personalization. This dress was very elegant, comfortable, modest, and a nice alternative to the traditional, shorter flapper dresses out there. I received many, many compliments on the dress. Read more
items.author: Mom of Six

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE This Dress!!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE this dress! It is well made and a great 1920s costume! I got so many compliments at the party I went to last night. The dress does run big so I fit perfectly into a medium when I thought a large was my size. I love this brand! Read more
items.author: Michelle Grenier

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grateful Gala Gown
items.body: So many compliments on this sequined gown! The gown was very comfortable and the sequins were secure! No litter. I wore this gown to a gala celebration of community theater. It was dramatic. Still, I did not feel like I was wearing a costume. I felt festive and elegant. Great value although I did need to spend money on a professional hem. I am 5 ft 1, 143 pounds, size XL Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and Beautiful
items.body: Well made and beautiful. Too long for this short person, but looks like it could be trimmed easy. Once I get shoes I will know better. The zipper is installed so well, barley know it has a zipper. Fit perfect. My measurements put me on the border of a med or large. After reading reviews, I chose the Medium and it fits perfect. I can't wait to wear to the fundraiser next month. Read more
items.author: Sue G

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not quite perfect
items.body: Gorgeous and nice quality, but had to return, because the dress runs too large Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, quality dress
items.body: I received many compliments on this dress at my event. Good quality. Good fit. Read more
items.author: Barbara Hisaw

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but damaged
items.body: Arrived with top layer of fringe ripped off, remainder of dress appeared fine but for $95 I would expect better quality control. Read more
items.author: Brendon A Ball

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Gold, Black Silver. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
